Description: Fragment of oval handle at neck join of a Rhodian pottery transport amphora. Clay fine light brown; cream slip. Rectangular stamp with grape cluster symbol.
Curator's comments: Name Asklapiadas. From same die as Alexandria, Greco-Roman Museum,ABC 0325.22.
Bibliographic references: Stoddart 1847 / Memoir on the inscribed pottery of Rhodes, Cnidus and other Greek Cities (90)
